item.description:
Good playoff game coming up...New England Patriots vs. the Houston Texans.  Game starts at 4:25. 

I will send my address to all "yes" responses.  Please park on "my house" side of the street, or in the driveway if there's room.  (diagonal on the left, so more cars can fit)

Please bring something to share and some spare shoes or slippers, so my floor doesn't get all wet and yucky.

I will provide water, soda, chip and dip, salsa and chips.

I will limit the "yes's" if I get too many as I can only fit 12-15 max. comfortably in my living room.

 

GO PATS!

SUZ
item.how_to_find_us: beige ranch with no number on the house, one car garage. lamppost will be on

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: watch the Patriots vs. the Texans
